entries.@drone_destroyed_win: THE DRONE IS DESTROYED. YOU WIN
entries.@drone_destroyed_defeat: THE DRONE IS DESTROYED. MISSION FAILED
entries.@obj_inv_destroy_drone_invader: PREVENT THE INTRUDERS FROM ENTERING THE FACILITY
entries.@obj_capture_base_invader: DON'T LET THEM CAPTURE THE BASE
entries.@too_close_to_enemies: TOO CLOSE TO ENEMIES, CANNOT USE ITEM
entries.@invader_description: Overseer of the top-secret Strafe Witness facility.
entries.@obj_invader_start: Eliminate the intruders before they reach their goal
entries.@obj_shellguard_start: Protect the drone and wait for further instructions
entries.@invader_ability_ready: ABILITY READY. PRESS <font color='#209DD6'>%tactical_mode%</font> TO ENTER STRATEGIC VIEW.
entries.@invader_ability_fail: STRATEGIC VIEW CANNOT BE USED HERE
entries.@beacon_planted: BEACON PLANTED. RE-USE TO RETURN TO IT.
entries.@invader_supply_drop_base: ENEMY SUPPLY DROP INBOUND NEAR THE BASE
entries.@shellguard_supply_drop_base: SUPPLY DROP INBOUND NEAR THE BASE
entries.@invader_supply_drop_pit: ENEMY SUPPLY DROP INBOUND AT THE BREEDING PIT
entries.@shellguard_supply_drop_pit: SUPPLY DROP INBOUND NEAR THE BREEDING PIT
entries.@invader_supply_delivered: ENEMY SUPPLY DROP DELIVERED. DON'T LET THEM CLAIM IT!
entries.@shellguard_supply_delivered: SUPPLY DROP DELIVERED. FIND IT AT ALL COSTS!
entries.@invader_tutorial_1: SHELLGUARD HAVE LIMITED RESPAWNS. DRAIN THEIR FORCES AND CRUSH THEM.
entries.@invader_tutorial_2: SHELLGUARD RESPAWNS INCREASE WHEN THEY BANISH YOU
entries.@shellguard_tutorial_1: TEAM RESPAWNS ARE LIMITED. REVIVING IS ESSENTIAL.
entries.@shellguard_tutorial_2: BANISHING THE CHOSEN GRANTS AN ADDITIONAL RESPAWN TOKEN
entries.@shellguard_tutorial_3: ONE RESPAWN TOKEN IS SPENT ON DEATH, ANOTHER ONE ON SPAWN
entries.@invasion_tip1: The Chosen wins by eliminating the Shellguard squad 4 times.
entries.@invasion_tip2: Defeating the Chosen grants an additional team redeploy for Shellguard.
entries.@invasion_tip3: The Chosen can enter Strategic View by pressing <font color='#209DD6'>%tactical_mode%</font>.
entries.@invasion_tip4: The Chosen has an extra set of abilities in Strategic View.
entries.@invasion_tip5: The Chosen's Strategic abilities share a common score pool.
entries.@invasion_tip6: The Chosen is camouflaged, but not entirely invisible.
entries.@invasion_tip7: You can mark the Chosen for your teammates by aiming and pressing <font color='#209DD6'>%spot%</font>.
entries.@invasion_tip8: Time to revive a teammate is limited.
entries.@invasion_tip9: Shellguard respawns are limited. Avoid death and revive your teammates.
entries.@invasion_tip10: You will hear the Chosen before you see him.
entries.@strategic_tutorial:
PRESS
%toss_tactical_1%,
%toss_tactical_2% OR
%select_item_slot_tactical_special_weapon%
TO USE ABILITIES, PRESSÂ %tactical_mode% TO LEAVE
entries.@pt03_name: Crystalline-infused particle launcher. Emits a concentrated beam of particles that burn everything in their path.
entries.@ult_tutorial: Hold <font color='#209DD6'>%fire%</font> to charge and shoot
entries.@2_retries_left_for_sg: <font face='FontMedium' size='38' color='#f4be34'>2 REDEPLOYS REMAINING FOR SHELLGUARD</font>
entries.@1_retry_left_for_sg: <font face='FontMedium' size='38' color='#f4be34'>1 REDEPLOY REMAINING FOR SHELLGUARD</font>
entries.@0_retries_left_for_sg: <font face='FontMedium' size='38' color='#f4be34'>LAST TRY FOR SHELLGUARD!</font>
entries.@tb02_description: Instantly transfers the Chosen to a recently occupied location. Restores a portion of HP.
